H0.text: What 1989 best picture Oscar winning movie, based on a play by Alfred Uhry, and co-starring Morgan Freeman, gave Jessica Tandy, at age 80, the award for Best Actress, the oldest winner in history. Steel Magnolias

H1.text: What 1989 best picture Oscar winning movie, based on a play by Alfred Uhry, and co-starring Morgan Freeman, gave Jessica Tandy, at age 80, the award for Best Actress, the oldest winner in history. Driving Miss Daisy's contemporary, Glory

H2.text: What 1989 best picture Oscar winning movie, based on a play by Alfred Uhry, and co-starring Morgan Freeman, gave Jessica Tandy, at age 80, the award for Best Actress, the oldest winner in history. The film adaptation of 'The Cherry Orchard'

H3.text: What 1989 best picture Oscar winning movie, based on a play by Alfred Uhry, and co-starring Morgan Freeman, gave Jessica Tandy, at age 80, the award for Best Actress, the oldest winner in history. Miss Daisy

A4.text: It is the only film based on an off-Broadway production ever to win Best Picture.

A5.text: Jessica Tandy (at age 80) became the oldest winner in history to win Best Actress.
